name: MAGIC PLANET 20/30
description:
History of calligraphy goes back around one thousand years ago in persia!
Persian calligraphy includes many types. My style name is ‘Nastaliq’. It has been the predominant style for writing the Persian alphabet.

I use combination of colored Nastaliq style calligraphy and various forms and lines. This style of work can be classified as post modern calligraphy!

This artwork is combination of calligrphy and magic planets and also motion and sound!

20/30
